ctx: assert (H : forall a b c : expr, |-- a || b --> c <-> |-- a --> c /\ |-- b --> c).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: assert (H : forall a b c : expr, |-- a || b --> c <-> |-- a --> c /\ |-- b --> c).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: assert (H : forall a b c : expr, |-- a || b --> c <-> |-- a --> c /\ |-- b --> c).
exceptions.exn: The reference H0 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x y z. assert (H : forall a b c : expr, |-- a || b --> c <-> |-- a --> c /\ |-- b --> c). { intros. split; intros. - split. + apply deduction_orp_elim' with b. * auto. * apply deduction_modus_ponens with (a || b); auto. + apply deduction_orp_elim' with a. * auto. * apply deduction_modus_ponens with (a || b); auto. - destruct H0. apply derivable_orp_elim with a b; auto. } assert (H1 : |-- prodp x (y || z) --> prodp x y || prodp x z). { apply H. split; apply deduction_andp_intros; apply deduction_modus_ponens; auto; [ apply left_distr2 | apply deduction_modus_ponens with (prodp x y || prodp x z); [ apply deduction_orp_intros1; apply left_distr1 | auto ] ]. } assert (H2 : |-- prodp x y || prodp x z --> prodp x (y || z)). { apply H. split; apply derivable_orp_impp; [ apply H | apply H; auto; apply deduction_andp_intros; [ apply left_distr1 | apply right_distr2 ] ]. } apply H. split; auto.
